attributes.action: introduce business tax incentives to actively promote remote home working and  therefore reduce daily  travel to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please support the proposal to promote through the use of tax incentives and other financial initiatives the concept of employing people where ever possible to work from a home environment by the use of the internet and the use of information technology. This could in a short time remove the need for road pricing and solve a number of related problems for example carbon emissions , global warming and increase in traffic congestion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
